module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%prefix%>user_invites`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `user_invites` ( `userInviteId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `inviterId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `invitedId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `code` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `email` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userInviteId`), UNIQUE KEY `code` (`code`), KEY `inviterId` (`inviterId`), KEY `invitedId` (`invitedId`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `email` (`email`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
